name: Patrick Wiseman
body:
### A man, a plan, a canal, panama.  Sans canal and panama.
Patrick Wiseman is a strategic business consultant and entrepreneur from Atlanta, GA. He is the founder of Wiserstudios, an agency created to provide expert counsel in making technology that is beautifully designed and delightful to use. At Wiserstudios, Patrick is responsible for business development, staffing, and project deliveries. He has completed projects in nearly every technology stack for the web and has learned more programming languages than he can count. He's also a big fan of being charitable, playing & composing music, brewing beer, designing furniture, roller derby, blues dancing, camp drag, and whiskey.

### Not entirely useless code snippets
* Kittenify: https://gist.github.com/patrickwiseman/4237725
* Figure out your taxes and take home pay: https://gist.github.com/patrickwiseman/4743827
* IE Console Shim: https://gist.github.com/patrickwiseman/4733137
* Semi-graceful Seeds: https://gist.github.com/patrickwiseman/4277283
* Log Wrapper: https://gist.github.com/patrickwiseman/5373857
* Extend your Facebook Auth Token: https://gist.github.com/patrickwiseman/5345922

### Support or Contact
Find me on [email](mailto:me@thephw.com) or [twitter](https://twitter.com/phwiseman).
